attributes.action: stop the illegal logging of the Penan homeland in Borneo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Penan's forests are being destroyed by intensive logging. The logging was sanctioned by the Sarawak State Government, but it ignores the Penan people's native rights to the forest. The Penan rely on the forest for their continued survival and we must help them to survive.
